channel.title: Chicago Rock Food Girls Applications on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Chicago Rock Food Girls Applications on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: i am so tired
item.description: i just realized that I have stood up on my feet for way too long. I am going to take it easy tonight.. which is strange considering that I have gone out a lot lately. You never know however… what happens later.. heh.. I may go out. chicago is wierd like that. I may also sit in my room.. drink soda and eat food.. which is amazingly appealing. oh.. and write web applications of course.
